question: 報道
sourceMnemonic:
<kanji>News</kanji> travels down the <kanji>road</kanji> by way of a <vocabulary>news report</vocabulary>.

<ja>報道</ja> specifically refers to information put out by news organizations or the press in the form of newspaper articles, radio or television broadcasts, etc. Notice that it's different from <ja>報告</ja>, which is more general and means the reporting of information by anyone.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
